00048 atomic_t IOHandlerData::ms_next_connection_id = ATOMIC_INIT(1);

00052 namespace {
00055   ssize_t socket_read(int fd, void *vptr, size_t n) {
00056     size_t nleft;
00057     ssize_t nread;
00058     char *ptr;
00059 
00060     ptr = (char *)vptr;
00061     nleft = n;
00062     while (nleft > 0) {
00063       if ((nread = ::read(fd, ptr, nleft)) < 0) {
00064         if (errno == EINTR) {
00065           nread = 0; /* and call read() again */
00066           continue;
00067         }
00068         if (nleft < n)
00069           break;
00070         return -1;
00071       }
00072       else if (nread == 0)
00073         break; /* EOF */
00074 
00075       nleft -= nread;
00076       ptr   += nread;
00077     }
00078     return n - nleft;
00079   }
00080 }

00082 bool IOHandlerData::handle_event(struct epoll_event *event) {
00083 
00084   errno = 0;
00085 
00086   //DisplayEvent(event);
00087 
00088   if (event->events & EPOLLOUT) {
00089     if (handle_write_readiness()) {
00090       m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00091       deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00092       return true;
00093     }
00094   }
00095 
00096   if (event->events & EPOLLIN) {
00097     size_t nread, total_read = 0;
00098     while (true) {
00099       if (!m_got_header) {
00100         uint8_t *ptr = ((uint8_t *)&m_message_header) + (sizeof(Header::Common) - m_message_header_remaining);
00101         nread = socket_read(m_sd, ptr, m_message_header_remaining);
00102         if (nread == (size_t)-1) {
00103           if (errno == EAGAIN)
00104             return false;
00105           if (errno != ECONNREFUSED) {
00106             HT_ERRORF("FileUtils::read(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd, m_message_header_remaining, strerror(errno));
00107           }
00108           m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00109           int error = (errno == ECONNREFUSED) ? Error::COMM_CONNECT_ERROR : Error::OK;
00110           deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, error));
00111           return true;
00112         }
00113         else if (nread == 0) {
00114           m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00115           deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00116           return true;
00117         }
00118         else if (nread < m_message_header_remaining) {
00119           m_message_header_remaining -= nread;
00120           return false;
00121         }
00122         else {
00123           m_got_header = true;
00124           m_message_header_remaining = 0;
00125           m_message = new uint8_t [m_message_header.total_len];
00126           memcpy(m_message, &m_message_header, sizeof(Header::Common));
00127           m_message_ptr = m_message + sizeof(Header::Common);
00128           m_message_remaining = (m_message_header.total_len) - sizeof(Header::Common);
00129           total_read += nread;
00130         }
00131       }
00132       if (m_got_header) {
00133         nread = socket_read(m_sd, m_message_ptr, m_message_remaining);
00134         if (nread < 0) {
00135           if (errno == EAGAIN)
00136             return false;
00137           HT_ERRORF("FileUtils::read(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd, m_message_header_remaining, strerror(errno));
00138           m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00139           deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00140           return true;
00141         }
00142         else if (nread == 0) {
00143           m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00144           deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00145           return true;
00146         }
00147         else if (nread < m_message_remaining) {
00148           m_message_ptr += nread;
00149           m_message_remaining -= nread;
00150           return false;
00151         }
00152         else {
00153           DispatchHandler *dh = 0;
00154           uint32_t id = ((Header::Common *)m_message)->id;
00155           if ((((Header::Common *)m_message)->flags & Header::FLAGS_BIT_REQUEST) == 0 &&
00156               (id == 0 || (dh = m_reactor_ptr->remove_request(id)) == 0)) {
00157             if ((((Header::Common *)m_message)->flags & Header::FLAGS_BIT_IGNORE_RESPONSE) == 0) {
00158               HT_WARNF("Received response for non-pending event (id=%d,version=%d,total_len=%d)",
00159                           id, ((Header::Common *)m_message)->version, ((Header::Common *)m_message)->total_len);
00160             }
00161             delete [] m_message;
00162           }
00163           else
00164             deliver_event(new Event(Event::MESSAGE, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK, (Header::Common *)m_message), dh);
00165           reset_incoming_message_state();
00166         }
00167         total_read += nread;
00168       }
00169     }
00170   }
00171 
00172   if (event->events & EPOLLERR) {
00173     HT_WARNF("Received EPOLLERR on descriptor %d (%s:%d)", m_sd, inet_ntoa(m_addr.sin_addr), ntohs(m_addr.sin_port));
00174     m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00175     deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00176     return true;
00177   }
00178 
00179   if (event->events & EPOLLHUP) {
00180     HT_WARNF("Received EPOLLHUP on descriptor %d (%s:%d)", m_sd, inet_ntoa(m_addr.sin_addr), ntohs(m_addr.sin_port));
00181     m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00182     deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00183     return true;
00184   }
00185 
00186   return false;
00187 }

00194 bool IOHandlerData::handle_event(struct kevent *event) {
00195 
00196   //DisplayEvent(event);
00197 
00198   assert(m_sd == (int)event->ident);
00199 
00200   if (event->flags & EV_EOF) {
00201     m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00202     if (!m_connected)
00203       deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::COMM_CONNECT_ERROR));
00204     else
00205       deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00206     return true;
00207   }
00208 
00209   if (event->filter == EVFILT_WRITE) {
00210     if (handle_write_readiness()) {
00211       m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00212       deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00213       return true;
00214     }
00215   }
00216 
00217   if (event->filter == EVFILT_READ) {
00218     size_t available = (size_t)event->data;
00219     size_t nread;
00220     while (available > 0) {
00221       if (!m_got_header) {
00222         uint8_t *ptr = ((uint8_t *)&m_message_header) + (sizeof(Header::Common) - m_message_header_remaining);
00223         if (m_message_header_remaining < available) {
00224           nread = FileUtils::read(m_sd, ptr, m_message_header_remaining);
00225           if (nread < 0) {
00226             HT_ERRORF("FileUtils::read(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd, m_message_header_remaining, strerror(errno));
00227             m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00228             deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00229             return true;
00230           }
00231           assert(nread == m_message_header_remaining);
00232           m_got_header = true;
00233           available -= nread;
00234           m_message_header_remaining = 0;
00235           m_message = new uint8_t [m_message_header.total_len];
00236           memcpy(m_message, &m_message_header, sizeof(Header::Common));
00237           m_message_ptr = m_message + sizeof(Header::Common);
00238           m_message_remaining = (m_message_header.total_len) - sizeof(Header::Common);
00239         }
00240         else {
00241           nread = FileUtils::read(m_sd, ptr, available);
00242           if (nread < 0) {
00243             HT_ERRORF("FileUtils::read(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd, available, strerror(errno));
00244             m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00245             deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00246             return true;
00247           }
00248           assert(nread == available);
00249           m_message_header_remaining -= nread;
00250           return false;
00251         }
00252       }
00253       if (m_got_header) {
00254         if (m_message_remaining <= available) {
00255           nread = FileUtils::read(m_sd, m_message_ptr, m_message_remaining);
00256           if (nread < 0) {
00257             HT_ERRORF("FileUtils::read(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd, m_message_remaining, strerror(errno));
00258             m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00259             deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00260             return true;
00261           }
00262           assert(nread == m_message_remaining);
00263           available -= nread;
00264 
00265           DispatchHandler *dh = 0;
00266           uint32_t id = ((Header::Common *)m_message)->id;
00267           if ((((Header::Common *)m_message)->flags & Header::FLAGS_BIT_REQUEST) == 0 &&
00268               (id == 0 || (dh = m_reactor_ptr->remove_request(id)) == 0)) {
00269             if ((((Header::Common *)m_message)->flags & Header::FLAGS_BIT_IGNORE_RESPONSE) == 0) {
00270               HT_WARNF("Received response for non-pending event (id=%d)", id);
00271             }
00272             delete [] m_message;
00273           }
00274           else
00275             deliver_event(new Event(Event::MESSAGE, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK, (Header::Common *)m_message), dh);
00276           reset_incoming_message_state();
00277         }
00278         else {
00279           nread = FileUtils::read(m_sd, m_message_ptr, available);
00280           if (nread < 0) {
00281             HT_ERRORF("FileUtils::read(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd, available, strerror(errno));
00282             m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00283             deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00284             return true;
00285           }
00286           assert(nread == available);
00287           m_message_ptr += nread;
00288           m_message_remaining -= nread;
00289           available = 0;
00290         }
00291       }
00292     }
00293   }
00294 
00295   return false;
00296 }

00298   ImplementMe;

00302 bool IOHandlerData::handle_write_readiness() {
00303 
00304   if (m_connected == false) {
00305     socklen_t name_len = sizeof(m_local_addr);
00306     int sockerr = 0;
00307     socklen_t sockerr_len = sizeof(sockerr);
00308 
00309     if (getsockopt(m_sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_ERROR, &sockerr, &sockerr_len) < 0) {
00310       HT_ERRORF("getsockopt(SO_ERROR) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00311     }
00312 
00313     if (sockerr) {
00314       HT_ERRORF("connect() completion error - %s", strerror(sockerr));
00315       return true;
00316     }
00317 
00318     int bufsize = 4*32768;
00319     if (setsockopt(m_sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDBUF, (char *)&bufsize, sizeof(bufsize)) < 0) {
00320       HT_ERRORF("setsockopt(SO_SNDBUF) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00321     }
00322     if (setsockopt(m_sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF, (char *)&bufsize, sizeof(bufsize)) < 0) {
00323       HT_ERRORF("setsockopt(SO_RCVBUF) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00324     }
00325 
00326     if (getsockname(m_sd, (struct sockaddr *)&m_local_addr, &name_len) < 0) {
00327       HT_ERRORF("getsockname(%d) failed - %s", m_sd, strerror(errno));
00328       return true;
00329     }
00330     //clog << "Connection established." << endl;
00331     m_connected = true;
00332     deliver_event(new Event(Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00333   }
00334   else {
00335     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00336     if (flush_send_queue() != Error::OK)
00337       return true;
00338     if (m_send_queue.empty())
00339       remove_poll_interest(Reactor::WRITE_READY);
00340   }
00341   return false;
00342 }

00345 
00346 int IOHandlerData::send_message(CommBufPtr &cbp, time_t timeout, DispatchHandler *disp_handler) {
00347   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00348   int error;
00349   bool initially_empty = m_send_queue.empty() ? true : false;
00350   Header::Common *mheader = (Header::Common *)cbp->data.base;
00351 
00352   HT_LOG_ENTER;
00353 
00354   // If request, Add message ID to request cache
00355   if (mheader->id != 0 && disp_handler != 0 && mheader->flags & Header::FLAGS_BIT_REQUEST) {
00356     boost::xtime expire_time;
00357     boost::xtime_get(&expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00358     expire_time.sec += timeout;
00359     m_reactor_ptr->add_request(mheader->id, this, disp_handler, expire_time);
00360   }
00361 
00362   m_send_queue.push_back(cbp);
00363 
00364   if ((error = flush_send_queue()) != Error::OK)
00365     return error;
00366 
00367   if (initially_empty && !m_send_queue.empty()) {
00368     add_poll_interest(Reactor::WRITE_READY);
00369     //HT_INFO("Adding Write interest");
00370   }
00371   else if (!initially_empty && m_send_queue.empty()) {
00372     remove_poll_interest(Reactor::WRITE_READY);
00373     //HT_INFO("Removing Write interest");
00374   }
00375 
00376   return Error::OK;
00377 }

00380 
00381 int IOHandlerData::flush_send_queue() {
00382   ssize_t nwritten, towrite, remaining;
00383   struct iovec vec[2];
00384   int count;
00385 
00386   while (!m_send_queue.empty()) {
00387 
00388     CommBufPtr &cbp = m_send_queue.front();
00389 
00390     count = 0;
00391     towrite = 0;
00392     remaining = cbp->data.size - (cbp->data_ptr - cbp->data.base);
00393     if (remaining > 0) {
00394       vec[0].iov_base = (void *)cbp->data_ptr;
00395       vec[0].iov_len = remaining;
00396       towrite = remaining;
00397       ++count;
00398     }
00399     if (cbp->ext.base != 0) {
00400       remaining = cbp->ext.size - (cbp->ext_ptr - cbp->ext.base);
00401       if (remaining > 0) {
00402         vec[count].iov_base = (void *)cbp->ext_ptr;
00403         vec[count].iov_len = remaining;
00404         towrite += remaining;
00405         ++count;
00406       }
00407     }
00408 
00409     nwritten = FileUtils::writev(m_sd, vec, count);
00410     if (nwritten == (ssize_t)-1) {
00411       HT_WARNF("FileUtils::writev(%d, len=%d) failed : %s", m_sd, towrite, strerror(errno));
00412       return Error::COMM_BROKEN_CONNECTION;
00413     }
00414     else if (nwritten < towrite) {
00415       if (nwritten == 0)
00416         break;
00417       remaining = cbp->data.size - (cbp->data_ptr - cbp->data.base);
00418       if (remaining > 0) {
00419         if (nwritten < remaining) {
00420           cbp->data_ptr += nwritten;
00421           break;
00422         }
00423         else {
00424           nwritten -= remaining;
00425           cbp->data_ptr += remaining;
00426         }
00427       }
00428       if (cbp->ext.base != 0) {
00429         cbp->ext_ptr += nwritten;
00430         break;
00431       }
00432     }
00433 
00434     // buffer written successfully, now remove from queue (which will destroy buffer)
00435     m_send_queue.pop_front();
00436   }
00437 
00438   return Error::OK;
00439 }
